articles.description: West Indies get over the line in a nervy chase to beat England by four wickets on Duckworth-Lewis-Stern in a rain-shortened third one-day international to clinch the series win.
articles.title: West Indies beat England to clinch ODI series win

articles.description: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery and midfielder John McGinn say it is too early to call them title challengers despite moving within two points of leaders Liverpool.
articles.title: 'I'm banning the T-word' - are Villa title contenders?

articles.description: The men's Big Bash League game between Melbourne Renegades and Perth Scorchers was abandoned because of an unsafe pitch.
articles.title: Big Bash game abandoned because of unsafe pitch

articles.description: Anthony Davis and LeBron James help the LA Lakers to victory against the Indiana Pacers in the NBA's first in-season tournament final.
articles.title: NBA Cup final: Anthony Davis and LeBron James inspire LA Lakers to historic win against Indiana Pacers

articles.description: The new contract with LA Dodgers makes the Japanese star one of the world's most valuable athletes.
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani: Baseball star joins LA Dodgers in record $700m deal

articles.description: Kilmarnock welcome Scottish Premiership champions and leaders Celtic to Rugby Park. Follow live radio and text coverage.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Build-up & team news as Kilmarnock host Celtic

articles.description: Billy Vunipola is sent off as Saracens start their Investec Champions Cup campaign with an away defeat by Bulls.
articles.title: Vunipola sent off as Saracens lose in South Africa

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says the humiliating 3-0 home defeat by Bournemouth left him "annoyed".
articles.title: Man Utd 'not good enough' to be consistent

articles.description: Devin Haney claims a unanimous points victory over Regis Prograis to secure the WBC light-welterweight world title in San Francisco.
articles.title: Haney beats Prograis for WBC light-welterweight title

articles.description: Jude Bellingham continues his remarkable start at Real Madrid by scoring his 16th goal in 18 games but the La Liga leaders are held to a 1-1 draw by Real Betis.
articles.title: Bellingham scores again but Real are held by Betis
